intension: Create a sympathy card with a simple and elegant design, conveying heartfelt condolences for the loss of a loved one. The card features black and white flowers and the message reads: Sympathy, WITH DEEPEST, We are very sorry for your loss. Love, The Johnsons
globalcaption: The image features a white flower with a black background, which is the central focus of the scene. The flower is surrounded by a few more white flowers, creating a sense of sympathy and elegance. The image is framed in a way that highlights the beauty of the flowers, making it an appropriate choice for a funeral or a memorial service.
keywords: funeral, condolences, sympathy, tb, tbo, instagram, insta, ig, post, black, white, flowers, frame, death, loss, bereavement, sadness, mournful

bglayer.bgcaption: The image is a black and white photograph of a dark room with a black background. There is a white square in the middle of the image, which stands out against the dark surroundings. The overall scene is quite dark, with no other visible details or objects

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a white flower with long stems, floating in the air against a white background. The flower is positioned towards the center of the image, and its stems extend outwards, creating a sense of movement and depth. The simplicity of the white flower and the white background emphasizes its delicate beauty and elegance

body.text: We are very sorry for your loss.
